verses.content: Dawnna innêm chun lungin- senna a hnawt hmang a, Ṭawng theidaum ruok chun lunginsenna a chawktho.
Mi var lei chun hrietna indik a hril suok hlak a, Mi invêt bau ruok chun invêtna a bun suok hlak.
LALPA mithai chu hmun tinah a um a, Thil ṭha le thil ṭha naw chu a hmu zing hlak.
Lei hrisêl chu hringna thing a na, Chutaka khêlthu ruok chu lungril kawidarna a nih.
Mi invêt chun a pa inchûktirna chu a hmusit a, Kâwkna ngaisaktu ruok chun varna a chang hlak.
Mi fel ina chun ro tamtak a um a, Mi khawhlo hlâwknaa ruok chun buoina a um.
Mi var hmûrhai chun hrietna a the dar a, Invêt lungril ruok chun chuong angin a thaw ve nawh.
Mi khawhlo inthawina chu LALPA ta dingin tirdakum a na, Mi tluong ṭawngṭâina ruok chu a lâwm zâwng a nih.
Mi khawhlo lampui chu LALPA ta dingin tirdakum a na, Felna hnawttu ruok chu a hmangai hlak.
Lampui mâksantu ta ding chun sukdikna lungngaiumtak a um hlak, Kâwkna theidatu chu thi ngei a tih.
Seol le Abaddon hman LALPA hmaa chun an um a, Mihriem nauhai lungrilhai chu a va um nasa âwm deh e!
Hmusittu chun kâwka um chu a ngaina nawh a, Mi var kuoma khawm fe ngai bawk naw nih.
Lungril hlim chun hmêl hlimtak a siem a, Lungril lungngai ruok chun lungvar a suksiet hlak.
Mi hrietthiemna neitu lungril chun hrietna a zawng hlak a, Invêthai bau ruok chu invêtnain ân châwm.
Sukrinuma umhai nihai po po chu ni rilo an na, Lungril lâwmtak mi ruok chun ruoiṭhe zing zingna a nei.
Hausakna nasatak, buoipuiumtak nêkin, LALPA ṭina le tlâwmte nei a ṭha lem.
Bâwngchal châwm thau buthlêng chutaka intheidana umna nêkin. Thlaihna buthlêng chutaka hmangaina umna chu a ṭha lem.
Mi nunsie chun inhalna a chawktho a, Mi lunginsen intak ruok chun inhalna a sukre.
Mi thabo lampui chu hling daihai ang a na, Mi tluong lampui ruok chu lamtluongpui a nih.
Naupa var chun pa lâwm a siem a, Mi invêt ruok chun a nu chu a hmusit.
Mi lungril bo ta ding chun invêtna hi hlimum a na, Mi hrietthiemna nei mi ruok chun a fena chu a suktlûn hlak.
Inrâwnna um nawnaa chu thiltumhai chu a hlawsam hlak a, Amiruokchu, thurâwntuhai inkhâwm laia chun tungding an nih.
Dawnna indik chun mi a suklâwm a, A huntaka thu a ni tak hril chu a va ṭha de!
Mi var lampui chu hringnaah a tungin a kai, Hnuoi tienga Seol chu a mâksan theina dingin.
Mi chapo sûngkuo chu LALPA chun kar thlûng a ta, Hmeithai ramri ruok chu tungdingpêk a tih.
Remruotna rilohai hi LALPA ta dingin tirdakum a na, Thu lâwmumhai ruok chu ân thieng.
Hlêpnaa duâm mi chun a insûng a chawkbuoi a, Thamna theidatu ruok chu hring a tih.
Mi fel lungril chun dawn dân ding ân chûk hlak a, Mi khawhlo bau ruok chun thil ṭhalohai a sâksuok hlak.
Mi khawhloa inthawkin LALPA chu a hla a, Mi fel ṭawngṭâina ruok chu a hriet hlak.
Mithai varna chun lungril a suklâwm a, Chanchin ṭhahai chun ruhai a suktlawr.
Hringna sukdikna ngaithlâkna neitu chu, Mi var lai chun chêng a tih.
Inchûktirna sêlkaltu chun ama lungril ngei kha a hmusit a nih; Amiruokchu, kâwkna ngaitu chun hrietthiemna a nei hlak.
LALPA ṭîna chu varna inchûktirna a nih; Chun, inzakaina hmaa chun inngaitlâwmna a fezie.
